title: An Interactive discovery tour of Victoria (PC)
brief_description: This program is produced under the auspices of Tourism Victoria and follows the campaign “You’ll love every piece of Victoria’. The main wonders of the State are presented in seven segments: Melbourne, Food and Wine, Shopping, Major Events, Arts and Culture, Regional Victoria, Location and Access. Aimed primarily at a foreign audience, the program is filled with maps, touring suggestions and good addresses as well as video interviews with Victorian identities. It is presented in 3 versions: Designed for PCs, this CD-ROM requires Windows 3.1 or above.
